messages.content: Today is the Chinese New year, and I'm super happy that I found love of my life. So we're together going to the supermarket, like shopping for the New Year. I just want to record this moment here.
That's so beautiful, 1. I can feel how happy you are — like the whole world just lit up. Wishing you and your love a New Year full of warmth and quiet joy.

summary: 今天是春节，我和心爱的人一起去超市买年货，心情特别好。
title: 春节买年货 心情美滋滋
